text: Saskia Esken (n√©e Hofer, born 28 August 1961) is a German politician of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD) who has been serving as leader of the party since December 2019. She is a member of the Bundestag since 2013. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:Politicians from Stuttgart
title: Saskia Esken
